summary: THE CONSUMERS DAUGHTER WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT AND THE  AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.  MR  THE SHIFT GEARS MAY HAVE BEEN THE CAUSE, DUE TO A RECALL.  THE GEARS LOCKED UP, WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS DOWNSHIFTING AT A RED LIGHT.  IT WAS DETERMINED THAT THE SLAVE CYLINDER HAD GONE OUT.   SCC   *NLM
